name: 8th International Conference on Research in Social Sciences and Humanities
content: The 8th edition of this noteworthy conference is coming to Helsinki this year. Built on the pillars of open exchange of knowledge and cross-border learning, this social sciences conference seeks to offer an exceptional style and quality of education in the fields of social sciences and humanities. At our past social sciences conferences, we have had attendees and presenters from all over the world, which have led to passionate and important discussions about the various subtopics and aspects of these disciplines. Having received stellar reviews for our previous conferences, we strive to build on that success to make this year’s event bigger and better. Don’t miss out on the preeminent social sciences conference of the year! We’re bringing together various kinds of academic experts, researchers, sociologists, anthropologists, linguists, political scientists, public administrators, university faculty, students, and so many more. Meet and network with them, learn from skilled speakers, participate in seminars, workshops, roundtables, engage in relevant and crucial discussions, and join a free guided tour of the host city at this exciting event.
